Messages.HelpTextAdmin:
To change the resources gained by gathering use the command:
gather.rate <type:dispenser|pickup|quarry|survey> <resource> <multiplier>
To change the amount of resources in a dispenser type use the command:
dispenser.scale <dispenser:tree|ore|corpse> <multiplier>
To change the time between Mining Quarry gathers:
quarry.tickrate <seconds>
Messages.HelpTextMiningQuarrySpeed: Time between Mining Quarry gathers: {0} second(s).
Messages.HelpTextPlayer: Resources gained from gathering have been scaled to the following:
Messages.InvalidArgumentsMiningQuarrySpeed: Invalid arguments supplied! Use quarry.rate <time between gathers in seconds>
Messages.InvalidDispenser: {0} is not a valid dispenser. Check gather.dispensers for a list of available options.
Messages.InvalidMiningQuarrySpeed: You can't set the speed lower than 1 second!
Messages.InvalidModifier: Invalid modifier supplied! The new modifier always needs to be bigger than 0!
Messages.InvalidResource: {0} is not a valid resource. Check gather.resources for a list of available options.
Messages.ModifyDispenser: You have set the resource amount for {0} dispensers to x{1}
Messages.ModifyMiningQuarrySpeed: The Mining Quarry will now provide resources every {0} seconds.
Messages.ModifyResource: You have set the gather rate for {0} to x{1} from {2}.
Messages.ModifyResourceRemove: You have reset the gather rate for {0} from {1}.
Messages.NotAllowed: You don't have permission to use this command.
